creator: graham.stock@barcap.com
text:
On using the RollingFileAppender using Microsoft (R) VM for Java, 5.0 Release 
5.0.0.3316, I get an uncaught java.lang.NoSuchMethodError in 
RollingFileAppenderBeanInfo. The code tries to catch a NoSuchMethodException, 
but in fact the NoSuchMethodError is thrown (at least by this JVM). This didn't 
happen in 1.1b1. Is it possible to add the MIcrosoft 1.1 JVM to the regression 
tests before new releases, as this is the default JVM used by applets in 
Internet Explorer. Thanks for log4j, by the way, it has proved very useful. 
(Stack Trace below)
Regards,
Graham
